name: Spearit Bear Music NFT Collectors 'Booster Badge'
description:
The official Spearit Bear 'Booster Badge' is made for collectors of Spearit Bear's music who qualify as 'Boosters' as described in the 'Spearit Bear Music NFT Rewards Blue Paper' (OBJKT#545148 as of 11.17.21) Recipients of this NFT may choose to hold them for future exclusive rewards or sell them on the secondary market, however secondary sales of this NFT will not count towards 'Builder Pool' rewards as they are not specifically music NFTs.
These badges are earned by gifting or selling 5 standard Spearit Bear music NFTs on the secondary market. A maximum of 10 Booster Badges can be earned per month per qualified Booster.
The more Booster Badges you collect, the better the chances you get at exclusive future rewards!
